reviewText: It was made for the europeon zone so I was unable to use.

I don't know, off course nobody wants to be enclosed in a wall , but what a lovestory it is!
Everybody is cast very well in this picture. I loved Anne Heywood as the lustfull nun. If you give one glance to her lover you will understand why she is so lustfull and then there is this nasty priest magnificently played bij Hardy Kruger.
Last but nog least very poignent music of Ennio Morricone, what do you want more, see and get excited to!
